Nightstrike::

"Then I'll come back in order to trainning, my lord" said 
Nightstrike "Long live to Decepticons!!!!"

The male came back to Decepticon's base

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> "Wait a bit Nightstrike. We will have a plan for it soon." he said,
> turning his attention back to the group. "All right Astrotrain, 
lead the
> way, the Stunticons will catch up shortly." He turned to the two new
> recruits. "Show me loyalty, and you will have the universe. Come, 
after
> we show this creature to oblivion, I will give you a tour of our 
base,
> personally." he said.
